text:
Daphne Oz, former co-host of The Chew, is getting positive feedback for posting an honest bathroom mirror selfie about her post-baby body. In the Instagram caption, Daphne, who welcomed her third child in December, shares that there’s no such thing as bouncing back.

"Seven weeks post-partum, still looking three months pregnant," she captioned a mirror selfie of herself in a black bra and underwear. "There is no bounce-back, it's all onwards and upwards. Every day has moments of total splendor and also a decent number of WTFs. I especially want the new mamas out there to hear that, because we see so much of how glossy motherhood can be and not enough of how real 3D life is always complicated (and better for it)."
title: Daphne Oz’s Body Realness 7 Weeks After Giving Birth: ‘No Bounce-Back'
